name: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 2: A House Divided
name_original: The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 2: A House Divided
description:
The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 2: A House Divided is an action-adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2014. Telltale Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
The Walking Dead: Season Two - Episode 2: A House Divided is available on PC, iOS, Android and Xbox 360.
